titleStmt.title: A rational method of daily religion consisting of four new offices of ordinary devotion; and a practical directory concerning the reasonableness and use of them. By a Divine of the Church of England.
titleStmt.author: Divine of the Church of England.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Percivall Gilbourne, at the George in Chancery-Lane, near Fleet-street,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect; tightly bound with some loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: the George in Chancery-Lane, near Fleet-street
